candidate_experience.career_progression: The candidate is currently a Machine Learning Engineer and has been in this role since May 2025. Prior experience includes roles focused on AI systems, indicating a progression within the field.

experience_gap: Jaideep has 5.5 years of relevant experience, aligning well with the requirement for an AI Automation & Solutions Engineer. The experience spans across fintech, rail analytics and 3D printing which demonstrates adaptability.
education_match: The M.S. in Advanced Data Analytics from the University of North Texas is a direct match for the educational requirements of this role.
strengths: Strong proficiency in Python and relevant ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow).
Deep expertise in LLMs, RAG, and retrieval systems.
Proven ability to deliver impactful results with experience in churn prediction, defect detection, and real-time dashboards.
Experience deploying AI systems on cloud platforms (AWS/Azure).

recommendations: Probe further into Jaideep's experience with Copilot and API databases during the interview.

areas_to_probe: Specific technologies used within Franklin Fitch's AI application suite.

His expertise in LLMs, RAG, and cloud technologies aligns well with the job requirements. He has a solid academic foundation and a proven track record of delivering impactful results.
hiring_recommendation: YES - Strong match based on skills, experience, and education. Further interview is highly recommended to assess specific technical expertise and cultural fit.
